isis.stitle: POWER STEERING PUMP: EATON MODEL BB135 R, L - REMOVE AND INSTALL - GEAR DRIVEN PUMP

step1.para: Disconnect both hoses at pump, taking care not to bend hoses any more than absolutely necessary. (With time and temperature exposure, hoses may take a "set" and will not have the flexibility of a new hose). When both hoses are disconnected, secure ends in raised position to prevent drainage of oil. Cover hose ends to avoid contamination of system.
Install caps at both pump fittings to prevent drainage of oil from pump.
Remove mounting flange to engine bolts and remove pump assembly with flange from vehicle.

Remove any existing gasket material from the pump mounting flange and corresponding engine mounting surface. Mount pump and reservoir assembly and accessory drive coupling on engine using a new gasket. Tighten mounting bolts to 35 ft-lbs. (47.5 Nm).
Fill reservoir and bleed system. Refer to BLEED SYSTEM.
